name: Electrical Installation
description: Professional electrical setup for residential and commercial properties. We ensure safe and efficient wiring, lighting, and power systems to meet your needs.

name: Solar & Inverter Solutions
description: We provide efficient solar panel installations and inverter solutions for energy savings. Our systems help reduce electricity bills while supporting a sustainable environment.

name: Battery Backup Systems
description: Reliable battery backup systems to ensure continuous power supply during outages. Our solutions guarantee your home or business stays powered during critical times.

name: Waterproofing & Roof Repair
description: Expert waterproofing and roof repairs to protect your property from leaks and damage. We offer comprehensive services to safeguard your home or business from weather-related issues.

name: Inverter Back-Up Power Installation
description: We install back-up power solutions to keep your electricity running during loadshedding. Our systems provide uninterrupted power during blackouts, ensuring your comfort and productivity.

name: Plumbing Services
description: We offer comprehensive plumbing solutions for installations, repairs, and maintenance. From fixing leaks to installing new fixtures, we ensure efficient and reliable plumbing for your property.
